channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:21 ATTENTION !!! Repel the threat of using guided aerial bombs (CABs).
item.description: 🟢 13:21 ATTENTION !!! Repel the threat of using guided aerial bombs (CABs). #Polohiv_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:19 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Polohivskyi district
item.description: 🟡 13:19 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Polohivskyi district #Zaporizha_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:19 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Pokrov territorial community
item.description: 🟡 13:19 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Pokrov territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 13:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 13:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
